question: How many years of experience has she had as a NT2?
answer: With post HBO from Radboud in'to Languages, Bachelor from Hogeschool van Arnhem en Nijmegen (HAN), MAVO from ST-Janslyceum, Petra Jansen has 1 yr 2 mos of experience as a Docent NT2 at COA Wageningen in Wageningen, Gelderland, Nederland, 4 yrs 7 mos of experience as a NT2 docent at VluchtelingenWerk Oost Nederland (VWON) in Nijmegen, Provincie Gelderland, Nederland, 4 yrs 9 mos of experience as a NT2 docent at VluchtelingenWerk Oost Nederland (VWON) in Nijmegen, Provincie Gelderland, Nederland, 4 yrs 11 mos of experience as a Leerkracht NT2 at ToTAALinburgering in Arnhem/Elst Bemmel, 1 yr of experience as a Stagiaire/leerkracht NT2 at Stichting Intercity in None, 9 mos of experience as a Docent rekenen at Stichting Intercity in None, 1 yr 6 mos of experience as a leerkracht at FasTracKids in Eindhoven, 6 mos of experience as a stage NT2 Leerkracht Agens at Agens in Arnhem, 9 mos of experience as a Leerkracht at Simonscholen in Oss, 5 yrs 7 mos of experience as a Medewerker bloedafname at SHO Medisch Diagnostisch Centrum in Nijmegen, 1 yr 10 mos of experience as a Pedagogisch medewerker at De Eerste Stap in, 5 yrs of experience as a Onderwijzeres at Basisschool in and is proficient in Teaching, Language Teaching, Research, Psychology, Organizational Development, Teacher Training, Team Building, Management, PowerPoint, Management Consulting, Curriculum Development, SPSS, Healthcare, Event Management, Customer Service, stagiaire Agens.
